desc: Hayley Lauren is a Melbourne based designer. Her artworks come in a variety of different styles and designs creating the perfect gift or decoration for nurseries and kids bedrooms. Her aim is to spread happiness through her art. To see her process check out her Instagram @hayleylaurendesign

layout.text: ART PRINTS PERFECT FOR YOUR HOME, KIDS ROOM AND GIFTS

Hi! I’m Hayley, the artist behind Hayley Lauren Design. If you are looking for a custom artwork or want to change the colour of one of our prints - Get in touch. And remember if you order 2 or more prints you SAVE!
